# disableActions()

**Type Method**

Returns whether actions triggered as a result of property changes made within this transaction group are suppressed.

## Declaration

```swift
class func disableActions() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if actions are disabled.

## Discussion

This is a convenience method that returns the `boolValue` for the [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/CATransaction/value(forKey:)] value returned by the  [doc://com.apple.quartzcore/documentation/QuartzCore/kCATransactionDisableActions] key.

## Temporarily Disabling Property Animations

- **setDisableActions(_:)**: Sets whether actions triggered as a result of property changes made within this transaction group are suppressed.
